welcome.TITLE:
Full Stack

Web Developer
welcome.DESCRIPTION:
Solid background and advanced knowledge in web development. For over 17 years, I have been designing, developing and managing projects in IT.

Achieved goals: Developing and consulting for companies like: Dell, Intel, Manpower Inc, Huawei, World Trade Center, Exxon Mobil, Blackberry, and many others.

about_me.TITLE: About me
about_me.DESCRIPTION:
I started coding at 11, I just love talking to machines.

Ultra fast learner, self-taught person. My passion is to make people´s life easier with technology.

I´m in love with JavaScript and I contribute to the open source community. I also know a few things like:

open_source.TITLE: Open Source
open_source.DESCRIPTION:
I'm currently an open source enthusiast and dedicate my free time to open source projects.

I'm the creator and maintainer of node-express-mongodb-jwt-rest-api-skeleton and vue-skeleton-mvp both with thousands of downloads.

These projects are what I call a Free starter web app combo:
API + Frontend

node-express-mongodb-jwt-rest-api-skeleton
GitHub Repository / Live Demo
vue-skeleton-mvp
GitHub Repository / Live Demo
